name: Connect to the date
description:
Today is the day. It's been so long since your last date. The only thing is that it is online.

You have to be on time no matter what.

The link to submit on the "gugle" page is www.tender.com

The current build of the game is not finished, we have a fixed version that we will upload once the Game Jam vote time ends.

This game was made in 48 hours for the Ryan Laley Games Spring Jam 2023. :D
